title: Some Blues
text:
Some Blues is an album by <a href="jazz">jazz</a> pianist <a href="Jay%20McShann">Jay McShann</a> recorded in 1990 and 1992 and released on the <a href="Chiaroscuro%20Records">Chiaroscuro</a> label in 1993.
Reception.
The <a href="Allmusic">Allmusic</a> review by Scott Yanow noted "Four different sessions featuring pianist Jay McShann are on this enjoyable CD ... All of the sessions are quite fun and are filled by colorful solos ... Overall, this is a difficult program not to love".
Track listing.
All compositions by Jay McShann except where noted
